headline: Is There Now An Opportunity In Edison International (EIX) After Recent Valuation Signals?
summary: If you are wondering whether Edison International's current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone. The stock recently closed at US$60.99, with returns of 0.1% over the last 7 days, 4.6% over 30 days and 0.1% year to date, while the 1 year return sits at a 0.3% decline and the 3 and 5 year returns are 3.5% and 24.7% respectively. Those mixed returns give you a picture of a company that has rewarded patient shareholders over several years, but has moved more...
